sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updated reference qual of cost plan field on Expense Line table</description>
        <name>Update ref qual of costplan on expense </name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'fm_expense_line');
gr.addQuery('element', 'cost_plan');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    if (gr.getValue('reference_qual') == "javascript:'top_task.sys_class_nameINSTANCEOFpm_project'") {
		gr.setValue('reference_qual', "javascript: new FinancialsForPPM().getCostPlanQualifierForExpenseLine(current)");
        gr.update();
        gs.log('Reference qualifier of cost plan on expense line table has been updated');
    } else {
        gs.log('Reference qualifier of cost plan on expense line table is modified by customer and hence not upgrading');
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-26 08:22:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>757a04fe534e71108d43130330e5e60c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update ref qual of costplan on expense </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="PPM Standard" source="com.snc.financial_planning_pmo">92ef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_757a04fe534e71108d43130330e5e60c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-15 11:38:41</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update ref qual of costplan on expense
